body_html:
Hi, I am facing the same problem with bidirectional_dynamic_rnn layers in tensorflow. I am trying to feed output from a convolution layer, converted from 4D to 3D with variable length sequences to a bidirectional LSTM and am getting the below mentioned error.

"Input size (depth of inputs) must be accessible via shape inference,"
ValueError: Input size (depth of inputs) must be accessible via shape inference, but saw value None.

Have tried everything that I can think of aside from extensive googling. Is there any update here ?

@amundle-cs : Were you able to solve this ? Do let me know. TIA.
@kjanjua26 : Thoughts ?
